subject: Sales
title: Discovery Questions That Uncover Needs
description: A quick win: understand Discovery Questions That Uncover Needs.

hook.text: A buyer wants faster software. Three questions later, the real problem is actually a broken workflow.

buildup.text: Surface requests hide deeper needs. Discovery questions peel back layers to find the true issue.

discovery.text: Use the framework: What? Why? What if? Asking 'What's the real impact?' reveals what buyers truly value.

twist.text: Most reps stop at the first answer. Going three levels deeper separates diagnosticians from order-takers.

climax.text: Ask 'Why does that matter?' repeatedly. Each answer moves closer to the emotional core of the decision.

punchline.text: The first answer is rarely the real one. Dig deeper.

quiz.question: Why should sellers dig past the first answer?
options: Surface requests often hide deeper underlying needs
